title.narrative: Start Fund - Emergency Response to affected population in Niger

description.narrative: Activation of the Start Alert - 518 was made on the 22nd of April 2021, the CO was called for a session to respond to committee questions on the same day. A full proposal was submitted on 23rd April 2021 based on recommendations from committee. Final decision made to allocate Welthungerhilfe in collaboration with Concern Worldwide a project budget of 100,000.00 pounds sterling covering a 45 day project
Overall Objective - To contribute to immediate relief for conflict affected IDPs , refugees, returnees and host communities through provision of multi-purpose CASH and WASH community sensitisation.

The project will support 800 HHs composed of IDPs, Refugees, Returnees and host community members who have been affected by the recent clashes in Damasack which caused thousands of people to flee their homes.
